v. 给……戴手套；（比赛中用戴手套的手）接（球）
wordGroup: velvet glove 外柔内刚；表面温和的东西
hand in glove 合作；勾结着；亲密地
glove box 手套箱；手套式操作箱（真空设备用）
fit like a glove 完全相合；恰好
take up the glove (向…)应战；接受(…的)挑战[亦作 gantlet] , 接受挑战
take off the gloves 不饶恕
glove compartment n. （汽车仪表板上的）贮物箱

sentences.en: She bent down to pick up her glove.
He bit the fingers of his right glove and pulled it off.
sentences.cn: 他咬住右手手套的指套，把它扯了下来。

sentences.en: There is a hole in her glove.
